TestSuit.Name: Draft Capabilities

Test.Name: Door control service is supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported
